original_text: Look! The Almighty Lord is coming with power. He will use his great strength to rule the people. Look again! He is bringing his gifts with him. He brings the prize that he has won in battle. Look! The Almighty Lord is coming with power. He will use his great strength to rule the people. Look again! He is bringing his gifts with him. He brings the prize that he has won in battle. Look! The Almighty Lord is coming with power. He will use his great strength to rule the people. Look again! He is bringing his gifts with him. He brings the prize that he has won in battle. Look! The Almighty Lord is coming with power.
korean_text: 보라 주 여호와께서 장차 강한 자로 임하실 것이요 친히 그의 팔로 다스리실 것이라 보라 상급이 그에게 있고 보응이 그의 앞에 있으며

sentences.original_text: Look!
The Almighty Lord is coming with power.
He will use his great strength to rule the people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 큰 힘을 사용하여 백성을 다스릴 것이다.

sentences.original_text: Look again!
